trans-unit.source: Specifies information about how a document is printed, including the printer that prints it, when printing from a Windows Forms application.
trans-unit.target: Specifica le informazioni sulle modalità di stampa un documento, inclusa la stampante che stampa, durante la stampa da un'applicazione Windows Form.

trans-unit.source: Typically, you access a PrinterSettings through <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrinterSettings%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.PrinterSettings%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties to modify printer settings.
trans-unit.target: In genere, si accedere un PrinterSettings tramite <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrinterSettings%2A?displayProperty=fullName>o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.PrinterSettings%2A?displayProperty=fullName>per modificare le impostazioni della stampante.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.PrinterSettings%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrinterSettings%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The most common printer setting is <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A>, which specifies the printer to print to.
trans-unit.target: L'impostazione della stampante più comune è <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A>, che specifica la stampante per stampare.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about printing with Windows Forms, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> namespace overview.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla stampa con Windows Form, vedere il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing>Panoramica dello spazio dei nomi.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing>

trans-unit.source: If you wish to print from a Windows Presentation Foundation application, see the <xref:System.Printing> namespace.
trans-unit.target: Se si desidera stampare da un'applicazione Windows Presentation Foundation, vedere il <xref:System.Printing>dello spazio dei nomi.</xref:System.Printing>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The default constructor initializes all fields to their default values.
trans-unit.target: Il costruttore predefinito inizializza tutti i campi in base ai valori predefiniti.

trans-unit.source: Typically, you do not create an instance of <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings>, but instead use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrinterSettings%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to set settings for the printer.
trans-unit.target: In genere, non si crea un'istanza di <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings>, ma usare invece il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrinterSettings%2A?displayProperty=fullName>per impostare le impostazioni della stampante.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrinterSettings%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the printer supports double-sided printing.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se la stampante supporta stampa fronte retro.

trans-unit.source: To print using duplex, and if the printer supports it, set <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.Duplex%2A> to one of the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Duplex> values.
trans-unit.target: Per stampare utilizzando duplex e, se la stampante supporta questa modalità, impostare <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.Duplex%2A>su uno del <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Duplex>valori.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Duplex> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.Duplex%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the printer supports double-sided printing; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se la stampante supporta la stampa fronte retro. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a copy of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Crea una copia di questo <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A copy of this object.
trans-unit.target: Una copia di questo oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the printed document is collated.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se il documento stampato verrà confrontato.

trans-unit.source: Collating is performed only when the number of copies is greater than 1.
trans-unit.target: Ordinamento viene eseguita solo quando il numero di copie è maggiore di 1.

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.Copies%2A> property to specify the number of copies to print.
trans-unit.target: Impostare la <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.Copies%2A>proprietà per specificare il numero di copie da stampare.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.Copies%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting Collate to `true` will print a complete copy of the document before the first page of the next copy is printed.
trans-unit.target: L'impostazione di Collate su `true` verrà stampata una copia completa del documento prima della stampa la prima pagina della copia successiva.

trans-unit.source: `false` will print each page by the number of copies specified before printing the next page.
trans-unit.target: `false`verrà stampata ogni pagina per il numero di copie specificato prima di stampare la pagina successiva.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the printed document is collated; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il documento stampato è fascicolato; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of copies of the document to print.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il numero di copie del documento da stampare.

trans-unit.source: Not all printers support printing multiple copes.
trans-unit.target: Non tutte le stampanti supportano la stampa di più copie.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.MaximumCopies%2A> property to determine the maximum number of copies the printer supports.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.MaximumCopies%2A>proprietà per determinare il numero massimo di copia supporta la stampante.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.MaximumCopies%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the number of copies is set higher than the maximum copies supported by the printer, only the maximum number of copies will be printed, and no exception will occur.
trans-unit.target: Se il numero di copie è maggiore del massime copie supportate dalla stampante, verrà stampato solo il numero massimo di copie e viene generata alcuna eccezione.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Some printers might not support printing more than one copy at a time.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Alcune stampanti potrebbero non supportare la stampa di più di una copia alla volta.

trans-unit.source: The number of copies to print.
trans-unit.target: Il numero di copie da stampare.

trans-unit.source: The default is 1.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è 1.

trans-unit.source: The value of the Copies property is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: Il valore di copie di proprietà è minore di zero.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> that contains printer information that is useful when creating a <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> che contiene informazioni sulla stampante che si rivela utile quando si crea un <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: With the CreateMeasurementGraphics method, you can obtain a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> for the printer without creating a print job.
trans-unit.target: Con il metodo CreateMeasurementGraphics, è possibile ottenere un <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>per la stampante senza creare un processo di stampa.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to make decisions on how to layout visual elements like fonts, sizes, and type styles of a complex print job.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>per sul layout degli elementi visivi come tipi di carattere, dimensioni e stili di tipo di un processo di stampa complesso.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> that contains information from a printer.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> che contiene le informazioni di una stampante.

trans-unit.source: The printer named in the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName*> property does not exist.
trans-unit.target: La stampante indicata nella <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName*>proprietà non esiste.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName*>

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> that contains printer information, optionally specifying the origin at the margins.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> che contiene le informazioni della stampante, facoltativamente, specificando l'origine in corrispondenza i margini.

trans-unit.source: With the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.CreateMeasurementGraphics%2A> method, you can obtain a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> for the printer without creating a print job.
trans-unit.target: Con il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.CreateMeasurementGraphics%2A>(metodo), è possibile ottenere un <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>per la stampante senza creare un processo di stampa.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.CreateMeasurementGraphics%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to make decisions on how to layout visual elements like fonts, sizes, and type styles of a complex print job.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>per sul layout degli elementi visivi come tipi di carattere, dimensioni e stili di tipo di un processo di stampa complesso.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate the origin at the margins; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>per indicare l'origine in corrispondenza dei margini; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> that contains printer information from the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> che contiene informazioni sulla stampante dal <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> that contains printer information associated with the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> che contiene le informazioni della stampante associate all'oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: With the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.CreateMeasurementGraphics%2A> method, you can obtain a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> for the printer without creating a print job.
trans-unit.target: Con il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.CreateMeasurementGraphics%2A>(metodo), è possibile ottenere un <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>per la stampante senza creare un processo di stampa.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.CreateMeasurementGraphics%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to make decisions on how to layout visual elements like fonts, sizes, and type styles of a complex print job.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>per sul layout degli elementi visivi come tipi di carattere, dimensioni e stili di tipo di un processo di stampa complesso.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings"></xref> to retrieve a graphics object for.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings"> </xref> per recuperare un oggetto graphics.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> that contains printer information from the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> che contiene informazioni sulla stampante dal <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> associated with the specified page settings and optionally specifying the origin at the margins.
trans-unit.target: Crea un <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> associato alle impostazioni della pagina specificata e, facoltativamente, specificando l'origine in corrispondenza i margini.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.CreateMeasurementGraphics%2A> method allows you to obtain a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> for the printer without creating a print job.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.CreateMeasurementGraphics%2A>metodo consente di ottenere un <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>per la stampante senza creare un processo di stampa.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.CreateMeasurementGraphics%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to make decisions on how to layout visual elements like fonts, sizes, and type styles of a complex print job.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>per sul layout degli elementi visivi come tipi di carattere, dimensioni e stili di tipo di un processo di stampa complesso.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings"></xref> to retrieve a <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object for.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings"> </xref> per recuperare un <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to specify the origin at the margins; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Per specificare l'origine in corrispondenza dei margini; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> that contains printer information from the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> che contiene informazioni sulla stampante dal <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the default page settings for this printer.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il valore predefinito di impostazioni di pagina per la stampante.

trans-unit.source: Page settings include the size of the margins on the page, the size of paper to use, and whether to print in color.
trans-unit.target: Le impostazioni della pagina includono le dimensioni dei margini della pagina, le dimensioni della carta da utilizzare e se vengono stampati a colori.

trans-unit.source: For more information about page settings, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings> class.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulle impostazioni della pagina, vedere la <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings>classe.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings"></xref> that represents the default page settings for this printer.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings"> </xref> che rappresenta le impostazioni predefinite della stampante.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the printer setting for double-sided printing.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta l'impostazione della stampante per la stampa fronte retro.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.CanDuplex%2A> property to check to see if the printer supports duplex printing.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.CanDuplex%2A>proprietà da controllare per verificare se la stampante supporta la stampa fronte retro.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.CanDuplex%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.Duplex"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uno del <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.Duplex"> </xref> valori.

trans-unit.source: The default is determined by the printer.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è determinato dalla stampante.

trans-unit.source: The value of the Duplex property is not one of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.Duplex"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Il valore della proprietà Duplex è uno del <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.Duplex"> </xref> valori.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the page number of the first page to print.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il numero di pagina della prima pagina da stampare.

trans-unit.source: The FromPage and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A> properties are used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog> when the user selects a print range.
trans-unit.target: Il FromPage e <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A>vengono utilizzate da di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog>quando l'utente seleziona un intervallo di stampa.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.AllowSomePages%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property must be set to `true` to enable the user to specify a print range.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.AllowSomePages%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà deve essere impostata su `true` per consentire all'utente di specificare un intervallo di stampa.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.AllowSomePages%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: In addition, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog> requires the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.MinimumPage%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.MaximumPage%2A> to be specified and the FromPage value to be within that range.
trans-unit.target: Inoltre, il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog>richiede il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.MinimumPage%2A>e <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.MaximumPage%2A>specificare e il valore di FromPage sia all'interno dell'intervallo.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.MaximumPage%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.MinimumPage%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog>

trans-unit.source: During the printing process, in the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=fullName> event, view the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A> to determine what should be printed.
trans-unit.target: Durante il processo di stampa nel <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=fullName>evento, visualizzazione di <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A>per determinare cosa deve essere stampata.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A> is <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange?displayProperty=fullName>, use the FromPage and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A> properties to determine what pages should be printed.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A>è <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange?displayProperty=fullName>, utilizzare il FromPage e <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A>proprietà per individuare le pagine da stampare.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A> is <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange?displayProperty=fullName>, then specify output only for the selected pages.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A>è <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange?displayProperty=fullName>, quindi specificare l'output solo per le pagine selezionate.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A>

trans-unit.source: The FromPage, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A> can also be set programmatically, though the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=fullName> implementation is the same.
trans-unit.target: FromPage, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A>e <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A>possono essere impostate anche a livello di codice, tuttavia il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=fullName>implementazione è uguale.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: The page number of the first page to print.
trans-unit.target: Il numero di pagina della prima pagina da stampare.

trans-unit.source: The FromPage property's value is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: Il valore della proprietà di FromPage minore di zero.

trans-unit.source: Creates a handle to a <xref uid="langword_csharp_DEVMODE" name="DEVMODE" href=""></xref> structure that corresponds to the printer settings.
trans-unit.target: Crea un handle per un <xref uid="langword_csharp_DEVMODE" name="DEVMODE" href=""> </xref> struttura che corrisponde alle impostazioni della stampante.

trans-unit.source: `DEVMODE` structures are device specific.
trans-unit.target: `DEVMODE`le strutture sono specifiche del dispositivo.

trans-unit.source: Copying a `DEVMODE` structure from one <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings> to a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings> for a different printer is not supported.
trans-unit.target: Copia un `DEVMODE` struttura da una <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings>per un <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings>per una stampante diversa non è supportata.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings>

trans-unit.source: When you are done with the handle that is created through this method, you must deallocate it yourself by calling the native Win32 `GlobalFree` method.
trans-unit.target: Una volta con l'handle è stato creato tramite questo metodo, è necessario deallocarlo manualmente chiamando Win32 nativo `GlobalFree` metodo.

trans-unit.source: When you call this method, you pass as a parameter the return value from the GetHdevmode method.
trans-unit.target: Quando si chiama questo metodo, il valore restituito dal metodo GetHdevmode è passare come parametro.

trans-unit.source: A handle to a <xref uid="langword_csharp_DEVMODE" name="DEVMODE" href=""></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: Un handle a un <xref uid="langword_csharp_DEVMODE" name="DEVMODE" href=""> </xref> struttura.

trans-unit.source: The printer named in the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName*> property does not exist.
trans-unit.target: La stampante indicata nella <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName*>proprietà non esiste.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName*>

trans-unit.source: The printer's initialization information could not be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: Non è stato possibile recuperare le informazioni di inizializzazione della stampante.

trans-unit.source: Creates a handle to a structure that corresponds to the printer and the page settings specified through the pageSettings parameter.
trans-unit.target: Crea un handle per un struttura che corrisponde alle impostazioni della stampante e la pagina specificate tramite il pageSettings parametro.

trans-unit.source: `DEVMODE` structures are device specific.
trans-unit.target: `DEVMODE`le strutture sono specifiche del dispositivo.

trans-unit.source: Copying a `DEVMODE` structure from one <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings> to a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings> for a different printer is not supported.
trans-unit.target: Copia un `DEVMODE` struttura da una <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings>per un <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings>per una stampante diversa non è supportata.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings>

trans-unit.source: When you are done with the handle that is created through this method, you must deallocate it yourself by calling the native Win32 `GlobalFree` method.
trans-unit.target: Una volta con l'handle è stato creato tramite questo metodo, è necessario deallocarlo manualmente chiamando Win32 nativo `GlobalFree` metodo.

trans-unit.source: When you call this method, you pass as a parameter the return value from the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.GetHdevmode%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Quando si chiama questo metodo, si passa come parametro il valore restituito dal <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.GetHdevmode%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.GetHdevmode%2A>

trans-unit.target: La stampante indicata nella <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName*>proprietà non esiste.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName*>

trans-unit.source: The printer's initialization information could not be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: Non è stato possibile recuperare le informazioni di inizializzazione della stampante.

trans-unit.source: Creates a handle to a <xref uid="langword_csharp_DEVNAMES" name="DEVNAMES" href=""></xref> structure that corresponds to the printer settings.
trans-unit.target: Crea un handle per un <xref uid="langword_csharp_DEVNAMES" name="DEVNAMES" href=""> </xref> struttura che corrisponde alle impostazioni della stampante.

trans-unit.source: When you are done with the handle that is created through this method, you must deallocate it yourself by calling the native Win32 `GlobalFree` method.
trans-unit.target: Una volta con l'handle è stato creato tramite questo metodo, è necessario deallocarlo manualmente chiamando Win32 nativo `GlobalFree` metodo.

trans-unit.source: When you call this method, you pass as a parameter the return value from the GetHdevnames method.
trans-unit.target: Quando si chiama questo metodo, il valore restituito dal metodo GetHdevnames è passare come parametro.

trans-unit.source: A handle to a <xref uid="langword_csharp_DEVNAMES" name="DEVNAMES" href=""></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: Un handle a un <xref uid="langword_csharp_DEVNAMES" name="DEVNAMES" href=""> </xref> struttura.

trans-unit.source: Gets the names of all printers installed on the computer.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene i nomi di tutte le stampanti installate nel computer.

trans-unit.source: You can use the collection of installed printer names to provide the user a choice of printers to print to.
trans-unit.target: Per fornire all'utente di scegliere di stampare su stampanti, è possibile utilizzare la raccolta di nomi di stampante installata.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.StringCollection> that represents the names of all printers installed on the computer.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.StringCollection>che rappresenta i nomi di tutte le stampanti installate nel computer.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.StringCollection>

trans-unit.source: The available printers could not be enumerated.
trans-unit.target: Impossibile enumerare le stampanti disponibili.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName*> property designates the default printer, except when the user explicitly sets <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName*>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se il <> </> *> proprietà definisce la stampante predefinita, salvo quando l'utente imposta in modo esplicito <> </> *>.

trans-unit.source: IsDefaultPrinter always returns `false` when you explicitly set the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A> property to a string value other than `null`.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce sempre IsDefaultPrinter `false` quando si imposta in modo esplicito il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A>su un valore di stringa diversa da `null`.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName*> designates the default printer; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName*>definisce la stampante predefinita; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName*>

trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se la stampante supporta la stampa del file di immagine specificato.

trans-unit.target: Immagine di stampa.

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se la stampante supporta la stampa di immagine specificato. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se la stampante supporta la stampa del formato di immagine specificato; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the printer is a plotter.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se la stampante è un plotter.

trans-unit.source: A plotter is a printer that is vector-based as opposed to raster-based.
trans-unit.target: Un plotter è una stampante basata su vettore anziché basato su raster.

trans-unit.source: Most vector-based printers use individual plotting pens to produce output.
trans-unit.target: La maggior parte delle stampanti basato su vettore utilizzano singoli penne tracciate per produrre l'output.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the printer is a plotter; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the printer is a raster.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se la stampante non è un plotter; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> se la stampante non è un raster.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName*> property designates a valid printer.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName*>proprietà definisce una stampante valida.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName*>

trans-unit.source: When you get or set some properties, a valid printer is required or else an exception is raised.
trans-unit.target: Quando si ottenere o impostare alcune proprietà, è necessaria una stampante valida o in caso contrario, viene generata un'eccezione.

trans-unit.source: To avoid exceptions, use the IsValid property after setting the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A> to safely determine if the printer is valid.
trans-unit.target: Per evitare eccezioni, utilizzare la proprietà IsValid dopo l'impostazione di <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A>per stabilire se la stampante non è valida.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName*> property designates a valid printer; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName*>proprietà definisce una stampante valida; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the angle, in degrees, that the portrait orientation is rotated to produce the landscape orientation.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'angolo, espresso in gradi, che l'orientamento verticale viene ruotata per generare l'orientamento orizzontale.

trans-unit.source: Valid rotation values are 90 and 270 degrees.
trans-unit.target: I valori di rotazione validi sono 90 e 270 gradi.

trans-unit.source: If landscape is not supported, the only valid rotation value is 0 degrees.
trans-unit.target: Se orizzontale non è supportata, il valore di rotazione solo valido è 0 gradi.

trans-unit.source: You set the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Landscape%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `true` to print a page in landscape format.
trans-unit.target: Impostare il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Landscape%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà `true` per stampare una pagina in formato orizzontale.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Landscape%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The angle, in degrees, that the portrait orientation is rotated to produce the landscape orientation.
trans-unit.target: L'angolo, espresso in gradi, l'orientamento verticale per generare l'orientamento orizzontale.

trans-unit.source: Gets the maximum number of copies that the printer enables the user to print at a time.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il numero massimo di copie che la stampante consente all'utente di stampare alla volta.

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.Copies%2A> property to the number of copies to print.
trans-unit.target: Impostare la <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.Copies%2A>proprietà per il numero di copie da stampare.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.Copies%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the MaximumCopies property to determine if your printer supports printing multiple copies at a time, because some printers do not.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare la proprietà MaximumCopies per determinare se la stampante supporta la stampa di più copie contemporaneamente, poiché alcune stampanti non.

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of copies that the printer enables the user to print at a time.
trans-unit.target: Il numero massimo di copie che la stampante consente all'utente di stampare alla volta.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage*> or <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage*> that can be selected in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il valore massimo <> </> *> o <> </> *> che può essere selezionato in un <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog"> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.AllowSomePages%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà deve essere impostata su `true` per consentire all'utente di specificare un intervallo di stampa.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.AllowSomePages%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Gets the paper sizes that are supported by this printer.

trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PaperSizeCollection>contiene <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize>istanze che rappresentano i formati della carta tramite la <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize.Kind%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà, che contiene uno del <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperKind>valori.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperKind> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize.Kind%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PaperSizeCollection>

trans-unit.source: Typically, you set a page's paper size through the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.PaperSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to a valid <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize> available through the PaperSizes collection.
trans-unit.target: In genere, carta il formato della impostato tramite la <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.PaperSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà su un valore valido <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize>disponibile tramite l'insieme di PaperSizes.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.PaperSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To specify a custom paper size, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Per specificare un formato personalizzato, vedere il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize.%23ctor%2A>costruttore.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PaperSizeCollection>che rappresenta i formati della carta supportati dalla stampante.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PaperSizeCollection>

trans-unit.source: Typically, you set a page's paper source through the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.PaperSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to a valid <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSource> available through the PaperSources collection.
trans-unit.target: In genere, è impostato il formato della carta tramite la <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.PaperSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà su un valore valido <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSource>disponibile tramite l'insieme di PaperSources.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSource> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.PaperSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the printer to use.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il nome della stampante da utilizzare.

trans-unit.source: After setting the printer name, call <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.IsValid%2A> to determine if the printer name is recognized as a valid printer on the system.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver impostato il nome della stampante, chiamare <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.IsValid%2A>per determinare se il nome della stampante è riconosciuto come una stampante valida nel sistema.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.IsValid%2A>

trans-unit.target: È inoltre possibile utilizzare il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.InstalledPrinters%2A>proprietà da ottenere un elenco delle stampanti installate nel sistema.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.InstalledPrinters%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolutionKind> is `Custom`, then use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution.X%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution.Y%2A> properties to determine the custom printer resolution in the horizontal and vertical directions, respectively.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterResolutionCollection> that represents the resolutions that are supported by this printer.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterResolutionCollection>che rappresenta le risoluzioni supportate dalla stampante.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterResolutionCollection>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the file name, when printing to a file.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il nome del file durante la stampa in un file.

trans-unit.source: The file name, when printing to a file.
trans-unit.target: Il nome di file, durante la stampa in un file.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the page numbers that the user has specified to be printed.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta i numeri di pagina che l'utente ha specificato per la stampa.

trans-unit.source: The PrintRange property is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog>.when the user selects a print range.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà PrintRange viene utilizzata il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog>quando l'utente seleziona un intervallo di stampa.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog>

trans-unit.source: The default PrintRange is `AllPages`.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è PrintRange `AllPages`.

trans-unit.source: To enable the user to specify a range of pages to print, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.AllowSomePages%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property must be set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Per consentire all'utente di specificare un intervallo di pagine da stampare la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.AllowSomePages%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà deve essere impostata su `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.AllowSomePages%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To enable the user to specify the selected pages to print, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.AllowSelection%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property must be set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Per consentire all'utente di specificare le pagine da stampare la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.AllowSelection%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà deve essere impostata su `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.AllowSelection%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: During the printing process, in the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=fullName> event, view the PrintRange to determine what should be printed.
trans-unit.target: Durante il processo di stampa nel <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=fullName>evento, visualizzazione PrintRange per determinare il tipo deve essere stampata.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If PrintRange is <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange?displayProperty=fullName>, use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A> properties to determine what pages should be printed.
trans-unit.target: Se è PrintRange <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange?displayProperty=fullName>, utilizzare il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A>e <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A>proprietà per individuare le pagine da stampare.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If PrintRange is <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange?displayProperty=fullName>, then specify output only for the selected pages.
trans-unit.target: Se è PrintRange <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange?displayProperty=fullName>, quindi specificare l'output solo per le pagine selezionate.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A> and PrintRange can also be set programmatically, though the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=fullName> implementation is the same.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A>e PrintRange può essere impostate anche a livello di codice, tuttavia il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=fullName>implementazione è uguale.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uno del <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange"> </xref> valori.

trans-unit.source: The value of the PrintRange property is not one of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Il valore della proprietà PrintRange non è uno del <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange"> </xref> valori.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the printing output is sent to a file instead of a port.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se l'output di stampa viene inviato a un file invece di una porta.

trans-unit.source: The PrintToFile property is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog> when the user selects the **Print to file** option.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà PrintToFile viene utilizzata il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog>quando l'utente seleziona il **stampa su file** opzione.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog>

trans-unit.source: In such a case, the output port is set to "FILE," causing the Windows printing subsystem to prompt the user for a file name when the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method is called.
trans-unit.target: In tal caso, la porta di output è impostata su "FILE","sottosistema Windows stampa richiedere all'utente per un file quando il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metodo viene chiamato.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The PrintToFile property is only used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog> and cannot be set programmatically.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > PrintToFile la proprietà viene utilizzata solo mediante il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog>e non può essere impostato a livello di codice.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog>

trans-unit.source: The `Print to file` option only appears on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog> when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.AllowPrintToFile%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Il `Print to file` opzione viene visualizzata solo nel <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog>quando il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.AllowPrintToFile%2A?displayProperty=fullName>è impostata su `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.AllowPrintToFile%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the printing output is sent to a file; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se l'output di stampa viene inviato in un file. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Copies the relevant information out of the given handle and into the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Copia le informazioni rilevanti dall'handle specificato all'interno di <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: `DEVMODE` structures are device specific and copying a `DEVMODE` structure from one <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings> to a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings> for a different printer is not supported.
trans-unit.target: `DEVMODE`le strutture sono specifici del dispositivo e copia un `DEVMODE` struttura da una <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings>per un <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings>per una stampante diversa non è supportata.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings>

trans-unit.source: The handle to a Win32 <xref uid="langword_csharp_DEVMODE" name="DEVMODE" href=""></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: L'handle Win32 <xref uid="langword_csharp_DEVMODE" name="DEVMODE" href=""> </xref> struttura.

trans-unit.source: The printer handle is not valid.
trans-unit.target: Handle della stampante non è valido.

trans-unit.source: Copies the relevant information out of the given handle and into the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Copia le informazioni rilevanti dall'handle specificato all'interno di <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The handle to a Win32 <xref uid="langword_csharp_DEVNAMES" name="DEVNAMES" href=""></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: L'handle Win32 <xref uid="langword_csharp_DEVNAMES" name="DEVNAMES" href=""> </xref> struttura.

trans-unit.target: Handle della stampante non è valido.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this printer supports color printing.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se la stampante supporta la stampa a colori.

trans-unit.source: To print using color, and if the printer supports it, set <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Color%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Per stampare a colori e, se la stampante supporta questa modalità, impostare <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Color%2A?displayProperty=fullName>a `true`.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Color%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this printer supports color; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se la stampante supporta colore; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of the last page to print.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il numero dell'ultima pagina da stampare.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A> and ToPage properties are used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog> when the user selects a print range.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A>ToPage proprietà e vengono utilizzate per la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog>quando l'utente seleziona un intervallo di stampa.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.AllowSomePages%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property must be set to `true` to enable the user to specify a print range.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.AllowSomePages%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà deve essere impostata su `true` per consentire all'utente di specificare un intervallo di stampa.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.AllowSomePages%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: In addition, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog> also requires the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.MinimumPage%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.MaximumPage%2A> to be specified and the ToPage value to be within that range.
trans-unit.target: Inoltre, il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog>richiede anche il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.MinimumPage%2A>e <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.MaximumPage%2A>specificare e il valore di ToPage sia all'interno dell'intervallo.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.MaximumPage%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.MinimumPage%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog>

trans-unit.source: During the printing process, in the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=fullName> event, view the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A> to determine what should be printed.
trans-unit.target: Durante il processo di stampa nel <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=fullName>evento, visualizzazione di <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A>per determinare cosa deve essere stampata.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A> is <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange?displayProperty=fullName>, use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A> and ToPage properties to determine what pages should be printed.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A>è <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange?displayProperty=fullName>, utilizzare il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A>e le proprietà di ToPage per individuare le pagine da stampare.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A> is <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange?displayProperty=fullName>, then specify output only for the selected pages.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A>è <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange?displayProperty=fullName>, quindi specificare l'output solo per le pagine selezionate.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A>, ToPage and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A> can also be set programmatically, though the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=fullName> implementation is the same.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A>, ToPage e <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A>possono essere impostate anche a livello di codice, tuttavia il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=fullName>implementazione è uguale.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: The number of the last page to print.
trans-unit.target: Il numero dell'ultima pagina da stampare.

trans-unit.source: The value of the ToPage property is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: Valore di ToPage proprietà è minore di zero.
